content: I tried to access the DevDays June 2021 slides and videos today, but Whova now says "This event ended more than three months ago. Please contact support@whova.com for more details." Are the slides available elsewhere for those who attended?
Hello Chris. Yes. You can find the recordings on HL7 on Demand. You should have received an email from HL7 with your password to obtain all recordings for free.
@Chris Moesel if you do not have that, please email Sadhana@HL7.org for access
@Mary Ann Boyle - found the email (sent June 21)! Thank you!
